page.title: 06Children's games
page.content: Ackey 1_2_3 More than one person is needed to play this game. We play it in the street. One person stands by a post or marker and has to hide his or her face while everybody else hides. This person is 'on'. Then the person who is on has to come and find the children who are hidden. If she or he finds them he or she has to run back to the post and shout Ackey 1_2_3 and the name of the person found. If anyone is left they can try to Ackey themselves, but if they say release then all the children caught are freed. When only one person is left free the game is over. The free person is 'on'.
